name: Come on-a My House
nutshell:
Koichi is a struggling young man whose dream is to live a peaceful life. He lives on his own, works two jobs, and he certainly isn't rich, but he's happy with the way things stand. One day, Koichi is on his way home from his shift at the convenience store when he comes across Reiji, a good-looking yet unfriendly regular customer, trying to help an abandoned kitten in the pouring rain. Somehow, Koichi and Reiji end up taking care of the kitten together…!! What will happen to Koichi's peaceful life!? The opening episode of a comedy story about a struggling worker with muscle, a cool but clumsy rich kid in college, and a cat.
Summary from Renta

name: Bad Luck Prince
nutshell: Shimizu Shigure is like a perfect prince who walked straight out of a shojo manga. No girl can ever even dream to conquer his heart

name: Primo Prima!
nutshell: Himezato Ui has just enrolled in her late mother's old high school, Shinomiya Academy, as a first year! Hatsu's mother was known as "Prima", the most beautiful girl, in the Academy. Ui was full of hope and expectations in enrolling in the Academy, but she was puzzled by the Academy's system of evaluation for students was by a point system. Furthermore, in the school, she met an unknown pretty boy?!

name: Seven School Mysteries
nutshell:
(from ebookjapan):
Horror manga master Jiro Tsunoda depicts the seven terrifying wonders associated with various schools in this school psychic manga.
At a girls' high school, a rumor circulates that a handsome man's ghost appears in the art room. Shinobu, a high school girl who refuses to believe the rumor, goes to the art room after school just for the fun of it, and encounters a handsome male ghost as rumored. At that moment, the ghost asks her, "What is your name...?"
Shinobu is then approached by...!

name: Ichigeki
nutshell:
A martial arts historical series about a peasant turned samurai and caught in the turmoil of the Satsuma Rebellion, in the first years of the Meiji Era.
Included oneshot: Inu no Seikatsu.

name: Maritan Eigo no Drill F*ck Hen
nutshell: A short manga about American Marines and the word "F*ck" through the eyes of the Japanese!  (From: MU)

name: Sora ni Mairu
nutshell: Sora Hiyodori, a housewife who's oddly familiar with machines and programming, went on a trip through space to deliver the ashes of her husband who passed away from illness to her mother-in-law. Accompanying her is her son Chuujirou, a robot installed with an AI.

name: Henshin Dekinai
nutshell: Car mechanic and ex-yankee Honda falls in love with Someya, a beautiful okama. Someya promises to go on a date with him in exchange for free car maintenance. Someya planed on teasing him since the mechanic was unaware of his true gender, but when Someya reveals the truth, Honda's attitude doesn't change one bit! And now Honda's acceptance has stirred up feelings of affection in Someya!

name: Personal Tailor
nutshell: Song Fengshi was the manager of a luxury store. He met an old classmate by chance, and woke up to find that he and his domineering president of an old classmate "exercised" last night. After fleeing, he soon discovered that the "domineering" president purchased their brand and became his "new" president...

name: Kojiki
nutshell: The origin of Japanese history, the world of the divine era! This is a manga adaptation of the first volume of the Kojiki, Japan's oldest book compiled by the Yamato Imperial Court. The story is narrated by Hieda-no-Are and O-no-Yasumaro. The story is divided into chapters entitled "Kunizukurihen," "Siblings," "Nenokunihen," and "Kami no Descenthen," in which Ishinomori depicts episodes such as the Ishiyado of Heaven and the Yamata-no-orochi, incorporating his manga artist's ideas!

name: Toumei na Ai no Utsuwa
nutshell: Miki Donoue has been plagued by bad luck since childhood… Then, one evening, he encounters a mysterious, semi-transparent man who claims to live by consuming other people’s emotions. Is this merely a dangerous deception, or could this intriguing stranger change the direction of Miki’s life?

name: I Have Twin Girlfriends
tags: Long Strip,Romance,Comedy,Office Workers,Harem,Drama,Web Comic,Slice of Life,Full Color
nutshell: My only girlfriend suddenly told me that she had a twin sister… She actually lied to me for so long! !

name: Worst Gaiden
nutshell: A side-story to Worst. Each chapters delves deeper into the backstory of some characters and reveals the story of their past. The first part goes on about the Umehoshi brothers, the second reveals how the forming of the Armament took place, and so on…

name: Peigenz
nutshell:
At the beginning of the 21st century a sudden increase in genetic mutations cause some people to be born with special abilities. However, these enhanced humans are not welcome amongst the general population. As time goes by, they are marked for exile and shunned by society, resulting in a life of crime for many. As their special powers make them difficult to apprehend, the government joins hands with an unofficial, secret group of bounty hunters known as Peigenz. The Peigenz organization is filled with the most gifted and highly trained mutated individuals.
Jay Berell, the heroine of the series, is a normal high school student. During a battle between Peigenz and a dangerous serial killer, Jay find herself caught in the crossfire. This triggers her special mutant abilities and leads to her recruitment into the Peigenz organization.

name: The Nagasaki Couple
nutshell:
(from ebookjapan):
Keiko goes to Mount Osorezan, where the spirits of the dead gather, to meet Kuramoto, the man who ruined her life and died. Keiko becomes doubtful about the existence of "itako" or itako who summons spirits and draws them to her, and decides to go back home.
On the bus on her way home, she meets a man traveling alone, and they decide to go together. However, when Keiko sees a man who looks exactly like Kuramoto at Aomori station, she unintentionally chases after him and...?

name: Ikaryaku
nutshell:
This is a series by the same author as Hellsing. It's a story about a girl that's new to the job of working in a gaming place.
The chapters are short, and it is read from left to right.
The story does not relate from one chapter to another. Each chapter is a stand alone story.

name: Renai Jikaku Shoujou
nutshell:
1-5) Renai Jikaku Shoujou
The beautiful, strong Agatsuma Tamaki has a weakness~ his kohai* (*junior in age or rank), Sawamura Kei, who simply just drives Tamaki up the wall by his mere existence. On one fateful night, Tamaki’s guilty secret was discovered by no other than…! Will romance blossom between this wild but emotionally inept couple?


Kimi to Boku no Itsu Pobun
Horiuchi has always been precognitive and his cousin always gave him a hard time for that. Now his bully of a cousin has to stay with his family temporarily and his ribbing doesn't stop. Oneshot also found in Saikou no Kimi


Afterword

name: I Became the Sacrificial Princess
nutshell: Unknowingly swapped upon birth, Princess Brianna lost her identity as a princess and became a vagrant orphan. One day, her Imperial Father suddenly sought her back, reinstating her back to her rightful identity as the nation's princess. However, what awaited her was not a family reunion nor was it an extravagant life, but instead, she was to become a sacrifice for the god. Reincarnated into the body of Princess Brianna, our main character only wants to change her fate of death, yet realises that the best way to do so is to become the sacrifice. The only way she can live is by becoming the sacrifice, as hidden scheming along with its causes and effects, slowly unravel in front of her eyes. (Synopsis: Gourmet Scans)

name: Detective Cat Manga
nutshell:
A cry was heard from outside the detective agency.
The story of the legendary detective cat that can solve any case!

name: Ashes of Love
nutshell: The Fire God and second son of Heavenly Emperor—Xufeng—was ambushed and trespassed to the Reflection Space in the Flower Realm. Suffering from injuries, he was rescued and treated by the clumsy Jinmi. Jinmi was then brought back to the Heavens by Xufeng, without realizing Xufeng’s true identity. Over a hundred years had passed, Xufeng had developed feelings for Jinmi—so did the Night God, Runyu. Runyu then used Jinmi as Xufeng’s weakness to threaten Xufeng’s position as the Crown Prince amidst the chaos caused by the war at the Demon Realm. At the very boundary between the Heavens and Demon Realm—River of Oblivion—was where both of the princes suffered the greatest loss of their lives. He achieved Nirvana and met a Grape Sprite. Is she actually a Grape Sprite? Juggling romance and the burden he shoulders, will this couple have a happy ending? How does one…quantify love?

name: Spike Promise
nutshell: Three short stories about the life of Spike.

name: Hoshi to Tabisuru
nutshell: In darkness, it's the only hope I've found.

name: Becoming the King's Man
nutshell:
Hailed as the number one host with the most gracious voice. I fell down the stage after being chased by a fan boy who was after me to confess his love and now I transmigrated into a prostitute? Uhm... But I am a straight! And now I must do things with this man in front of me? Ah... my back. Wait, what?! This whole world's men are after my body? Emmm... well I mean since the start of this story is already like this. so, I guess I will have to just free myself...
Official Japanese:
https://www.comico.jp/comic/8119

name: Love Live! - Rin wa Sonna Pantsu Hakanai Nya!! (Doujinshi)
Immortal Hounds
nutshell:
Kenzaki Shin'ichi is leader of the Anti-Vector Task Squad. He's in charge of hunting down Vectors, humans that carry with them the deadly Resurrection Deficiency Syndrome, a disease that can keep someone from resurrecting when they die.

Officially Translated:

In French by Ki-oon

name: Dear Boy, You Dropped Your Integrity
nutshell: I, Pei Zhuopei, direct disciple of the Beggar Sect's elder managed to enter the Ace Detective Court with my extraordinary acting skills. I swore to seek vengeance but… hey, hey, that pretty boy senior with the sarcastic mouth over there, who are you calling a scrap-collecting beggar? I will fight you!

name: Kitan Jojishi Mother Goose
nutshell: What if all the nursery rhymes you heard as a child were real - and more importantly, what if they were all out to kill you?

name: Colossus Order
nutshell:
Resting in different lands are the legends of Colossus – It was said that a single Colossus can change the tide of the war. At this point in time the only information that was disclosed was that there are multiple of these beings in each world.
In this chaotic world, the appearance of the gigantic warrior (Colossus) will save the humanity.
This series is based on a Trading Card Game.
